finetuned.fintune 1: Put the credit cards on the blue sofa at any time. Simultaneously, move vase from the entertainment center to the coffee table.

finetuned.fintune 3: Put the credit cards on the blue sofa at any time. After putting the credit cards, move vase from the entertainment center to the coffee table.
